text.autoconfig.infinitybuttons.option.a: The way in which Emergency Buttons produce an alarm
RANGE: Alarms are audible up to a certain radius
GLOBAL: Alarms are audible from anywhere in the world
§cChanging this client-side has no effect on a server,
§cit has to be changed in the server's config
The distance in chunks in which the alarm is heard when 'Alarm Type' is set to 'RANGE'
Makes villagers run to their beds when hearing an alarm
text.autoconfig.infinitybuttons.option.d: Whether Diamond Buttons have particles around them
text.autoconfig.infinitybuttons.option.f: Whether a server should force clients to hide secret buttons when using Jade
§cChanging this client-side has no effect on a server,
§cit has to be changed in the server's config
